text: Shang Tsung is a fictional character in the franchise Mortal Kombat. He first appeared as the main antagonist of Mortal Kombat (1992). ==Portrayals== He was portrayed in games by Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992 Category:Fictional characters with slowed ageing Category:Fictional shapeshifters Category:Mortal Kombat characters Category:Video game bosses
title: Shang Tsung
